imdb.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
imdb.plot: Yugi Mutou is a shy young boy who has finally completed his grandfather's Thousand-Year puzzle. Little does he realize that this puzzle unleashes an alter ego who challenges anyone who hurts Yugi to a game. The losers often pay de...

episodes.title: Gekiretsu Batoru, Yami no Geemu
episodes.plot: Yuugi is a shy boy who doesn't really have any friends. When he solves an ancient puzzle, it unleashes an alter ego that takes control of Yuugi when someone hurts him, and challenges them to a game called 'The Yami No Game'

episodes.title: Akuma Geemaa, Jigoku no Wana
episodes.plot: A convict believed to be Tetsu Tasaki escapes from prison, leaving the city in a panic. Yugi Muto and his friends notice Anzu Mazaki has been behaving strange lately. Investigation causes them to get involved with the police search for the convict.

episodes.title: Gekitotsu! Saikyou no Monsutaa
episodes.plot: Yugi meets Seto Kaiba, a new student who is Duel Monsters expert and head of a corporation.

episodes.title: Goudatsu! Chou Maboroshi no Geki Rea Tokei
episodes.plot: Honda waits in line to get a rare watch for Miho. Later on at an arcade the watch is stolen by Shotaro. Yugi's effort to get it back leads him to the arcade's basement where a Shadow Game begins...

episodes.title: Ima Agakareru!! Yuugi no Himitsu
episodes.plot: A man from ancient Egypt comes to the museum where he sees Yugi with the Millennium Puzzle. He travels in Yugi's mind to see if the puzzle really belongs to Yugi. In there, Dark Yugi challenges him to a game where the man from Egypt must find the real door which has the Millennium Puzzle in it.

episodes.title: Zettai Zetsumei!! Atsuki Yuujou Kessen
episodes.plot: Shadi, the man from Egypt, attacks Yoshimori, and then infiltrates Anzu's room of mind to make her play Yugi right into his hands to play a Shadow Game.

episodes.title: Urawaza, Dijitaru Petto Soudou
episodes.plot: The popularity of Digital Pets leads to a contest, and Honda trains Miho's pet, so they can take the paid trip. Meanwhile, Yugi is worried for his friend Haiyama, who seems to be pressured into some shady business by the bully Kujirada. But all is not what it seems...

episodes.title: Geemu Shitennou, Tsui ni Ugoku
episodes.plot: Yugi is kidnapped by Kaiba, and forced to duel the first of his four Game Masters, Count Ridley Sheldon. Can Dark Yugi defeat his doll monsters?

episodes.title: Sakuretsu, Yooyoo Kyuukyoku no Higi
episodes.plot: The gang is concerned and confused when they see Jonouchi with a gang wielding yo-yos as weapons. Has he turned his back on his friends?

episodes.title: Semaru Bijin Kyoushi, Himitsu no Kamen
episodes.plot: Anzu clashes with the beautiful but sadistically strict Ms. Chono, and organizes a petition to change the school rules.

episodes.title: Uwasa No Cappumon, Shintoujou Daze
episodes.plot: Yugi's friends Miho and Warashibe are obsessed with Capsule Monster Chess. After Miho spurns his advances, Warashibe decides to eliminate his competition for her affection.

episodes.title: Kyouun wo Yobu Teki, Fuhai no Shinwa
episodes.plot: Game show champion Ryuichi Fuwa (Kaiba's second Game Master) moves to the gang's high school. Although he seems friendly, his tactics have a more sinister plan.

episodes.title: Joseito wo Nerau, Dai Yogen no Kiba
episodes.plot: Fraudulent psychic Kokurano has his eyes on Anzu. Though Anzu doesn't believe his predictions at first, her desire to see her mysterious savior leads her right into Kokurano's grasp.

episodes.title: Bakuha Geemu de Saiaku Deeto
episodes.plot: When Anzu realizes that Yugi is her mysterious crush, Anzu invites him on a date to an amusement park, intending to put herself in danger to see Dark Yugi.

episodes.title: Kowaai Onna!! Henshin Dekinai
episodes.plot: A new girl named Risa Kageyama wants to become Yugi's girlfriend. But Risa is actually intent on obtaining Yugi's rare Violet Hecate card.

episodes.title: Ippatsu Gyakuten, Hakui no Kiki
episodes.plot: Jonouchi has a crush on Miyuki, the nurse taking care of his sister Shizuka. But when a corrupted doctor fires her, Jonouchi can't expose him, or Shizuka will be kicked out of the hospital.

episodes.title: Girigiri Shoubu, Sasou Moderu
episodes.plot: Kaiba's third Game Master, famous model Aileen Rao, challenges Dark Yugi to a game of Raijinhai. Aileen prides herself on taking away the most important things from the ones she defeats...

episodes.title: Kindan Geemu ni Te wo Dasu Na
episodes.plot: Yugi befriends Imori, and the two discover the forbidden game Dragon Block.

episodes.title: Dai Ransen!! Ninki Kontesuto
episodes.plot: With Honda's support, Miho enters a popularity contest against arrogant school beauty Kaoruko Himekoji. Soon Kaoruko resorts to cheating, but when she hurts Miho, she incurs the wrath of Dark Yugi.

episodes.title: Deta!! Saikyou Saigo no Kirifuda
episodes.plot: Kaiba Corporation cannot lose a game of secrets, and Kaiba has a final warrior at his disposal...

episodes.title: Kansei!! Kyuukyoku Geemu Rando
episodes.plot: Kaiba kidnaps Yugi's grandpa and dares him to come to Death-T, an amusement park full of death trap games.

episodes.title: Yabure, Genkai Shooting
episodes.plot: The Kaiba brothers scheme continues. How will Sugoruko Muto defeat them?

episodes.title: Kapumon Kingu! Choujou Kessen
episodes.plot: With Honda seemingly dead, an enraged Dark Yugi battles Mokuba, Kaiba's little brother, in Capsule Monster Chess.

episodes.title: Ima! Kecchaku no Toki, Kiseki no Yuujou
episodes.plot: It is Yugi Muto vs. Seto Kaiba. Who will come out victorious from this shadow game?

episodes.title: Arata Naru Tenkai, Osou Bishounen
episodes.plot: Yugi and his friends meet Ryou Bakura, a gentle new student with an interest in role-playing games. Little do they know the danger that dwells within him...

episodes.title: Raibaru Gekitotsu, Saidai Pinchi
episodes.plot: Yami Yugi aids the others against Dark Bakura and his RPG's boss, Dark Master Zorc.

episodes.title: Yuujou Densetsu Kara Shinwa e
episodes.plot: Even when seemingly defeated, Zorc rises again and threatens to overwhelm the gang. It is up to Bakura to defeat his evil counterpart.
